attributes.action: Please ban the sale of extremely loud fireworks
attributes.additional_details: Please ban the sale of extremely loud fireworks. These are not the usual type of fireworks but rather literally as loud as a bomb going off and a lot of people don't care about the curfew which is so selfish. Most people have to work, have children that need to sleep, disabled family members, there are the elderly and there are animals that all get extremely frightened.
attributes.background: Please ban the sale of extremely loud fireworks immediately. These are not the usual type of fireworks but rather literally as loud as a bomb going off.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action: 

Reduce the maximum decibel limit on fireworks from 120 to 90 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700049
